result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ga: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.orig: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.html: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad a gcoṁairlí i dteannta a ċéile agus dúirt siad gurḃ ḟearr an duais a ṫaḃairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: He used to claim that it was self-instruction that enabled him to conceive unusual ideas.
result.ga: Mhaíodh sé gurbh é an féinoideachas a chuir ar a chumas aige smaointe neamhghnácha a cheapadh
result.orig: Mhaíodh sé gurbh é an féinoideachas a chuir ar a chumas aige smaointe neamhghnácha a cheapadh
result.html: Mhaíodh sé gurbh é an féinoideachas a chuir ar a chumas aige smaointe neamhghnácha a cheapadhHe used to claim that it was self-instruction that enabled him to conceive unusual ideas.
result.ponchtml: Ṁaíoḋ sé gurḃ é an féinoideaċas a ċuir ar a ċumas aige smaointe neaṁġnáċa a ċeapaḋHe used to claim that it was self-instruction that enabled him to conceive unusual ideas.

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ga: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.orig: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: B'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
